content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court case in ljubljana the case involves the division of a real estate property between two expartners the total value of the property is 30000 eur and both parties are awarded a ½ share the specific sections of the marriage family relations act that were used in the decision are sections 51 and 59 the court ruled that the property belongs to both parties equally the applicant alleges that they have equal shares in the property as they have jointly invested in its construction the defendant has admitted the claim so the court will issue a judgment in favor of the applicant the text also explains the process for filing an appeal including the requirements and consequences if not followed correctly
